com.example.foodhub.Customer

Class BrowseFirmsAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • <any>
      • com.example.foodhub.Customer.BrowseFirmsAdapter

  • public class BrowseFirmsAdapter
extends <any>
    The controller for the R.layout.view_browse_firm view, placing them in a recycler
    See Also:
    RecyclerView.Adapter

        Constructs a BrowseFirmsAdapter given enumerated information
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the current user
        password - The password of the current user
        fragment - The specific fragment within which the recycler lies
        firms - The list of firms retrieved form the backend
